brand_identity.name: PDF Master
brand_identity.emotional_tone: A professional tool that feels like a superpower. Dark, sleek, and highly responsive.

usage_rules.headings: Use 'Outfit' for all H1-H6. Tracking tight (-0.02em). Weight: 600 or 700 for H1/H2, 500 for others.
usage_rules.body: Use 'Plus Jakarta Sans' for all paragraphs and UI text. Leading relaxed.
usage_rules.buttons: Use 'Plus Jakarta Sans' Weight 600. Tracking normal.

homepage_grid.classes: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 xl:grid-cols-4 gap-6
homepage_grid.item_style: relative overflow-hidden rounded-2xl p-6 hover:bg-white/5 transition-all duration-300 group border border-white/10 hover:border-indigo-500/30

hero_section.alignment: Center aligned text, but with asymmetrical background elements.
hero_section.elements: Large H1 (text-5xl md:text-7xl), Gradient Text for 'Master', Subtitle (text-xl text-muted-foreground), Primary CTA with glow.

tool_page.structure: Two-column layout on large screens (Upload Area | Settings/Info). Single column on mobile.
tool_page.upload_zone: Min-height 400px. Dashed border (border-dashed border-2 border-white/20). Centered content. Drag & Drop active state: border-indigo-500 bg-indigo-500/10.

variants.default: bg-gradient-to-r from-indigo-600 to-purple-600 hover:from-indigo-500 hover:to-purple-500 text-white shadow-lg shadow-indigo-500/25 hover:shadow-indigo-500/40 hover:-translate-y-0.5

Card.base: bg-gray-900/50 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/10 rounded-xl overflow-hidden

Input.base: bg-white/5 border-white/10 focus:border-indigo-500 focus:ring-indigo-500/20 rounded-lg h-12

hero_background.usage: Use as a fixed background image with 'object-cover opacity-40 mix-blend-screen' or similar to create atmosphere without overwhelming text.

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px. Size 24px for UI, 48px for Feature Cards.

universal_guidelines.spacing: Use generous padding. Minimum p-6 for cards. Section gaps should be gap-16 or gap-24.
universal_guidelines.contrast: Ensure text is legible. Use text-gray-400 for secondary text, never dark gray on dark background.
universal_guidelines.interaction: All interactive elements must have a hover state. Buttons should scale slightly or glow. Cards should lift.
universal_guidelines.border_radius: Use rounded-xl or rounded-2xl for containers. rounded-full for buttons.
universal_guidelines.animation: Use 'framer-motion' for page transitions and list staggering. Elements should fade in and slide up.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css immediately.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js with the colors and font families defined above.
3. GLOBAL CSS: Add the base styles (background color, text color) to index.css.
4. COMPONENT OVERRIDES: When using Shadcn components, override the default styles using the 'cn()' utility to match the 'Glassmorphism' aesthetic.
5. HERO SECTION: Build a stunning hero section using the provided background image and gradient text.
6. TOOLS GRID: Create a responsive grid for the PDF tools. Each tool card should have an icon, title, and short description.
7. UPLOAD ZONE: Make the file upload area the centerpiece of individual tool pages. It must look inviting and interactive.
8. DO NOT use white backgrounds. This is a dark-themed app.
